body_html: @fmassa As is, the function is best suited for Sequential modules. I suppose to really support arbitrary graphs, an additional Connected To column would be necessary (similar to Keras model summary) to accurately display the network topology. What do you think? Are there other features needed for arbitrary graphs (or other features you think are still missing)? Also this PR comment log/revision history is getting a bit big, should this feature be slated for a separate PR?

body: @fmassa As is, the function is best suited for `Sequential` modules. I suppose to really support arbitrary graphs, an additional `Connected To` column would be necessary (similar to Keras model summary) to accurately display the network topology. What do you think? Are there other features needed for arbitrary graphs (or other features you think are still missing)? Also this PR comment log/revision history is getting a bit big, should this feature be slated for a separate PR?
